it's been a while it's been a while bill
it was six years ago

contemplative set of indie folk songs

and it was about ten years ago that
Bill's

that bill had forged a reputation as one

and lo-fi under the name Smaug through
the 90s and auth Smaug came out with

take the 1993 Smaug album Julius Caesar

on this thing it's like Beck's early

just taking the piss compare that to the
farm mellower and more coherent sounds
Smaug was dabbling in just a decade
later and it's like listening to two
totally different bands the material
Smaug was coming out with in the 2000
saw the project transition into these
more Americana influenced sounds which
allowed bill to transition into the
musical state that he's in the midst of
today so even though it's been years

very much see Bill kicking around the

methodology on this one has undergone

change and this isn't really a brief

sort of like shooting the breeze for

long strung tracklist of musical

funny
